entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Altona
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:34 PM CST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Clear. Low minus 29.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind west 20 km/h. Low minus 29. Wind chill minus 33 this evening and minus 42 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 21.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light early in the morning. High minus 21. Wind chill minus 42 in the morning and minus 28 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Saturday 28 January 2023
